thread.section_title: Yahoo! Finance: Advertising Agencies Industry News
thread.title: Omnicom tops Street 3Q forecasts
thread.title_full: Omnicom tops Street 3Q forecasts - Yahoo Finance

author: yahoo
title: Omnicom tops Street 3Q forecasts
text:
NEW YORK (AP) _ Omnicom Group Inc. (OMC) on Tuesday reported third-quarter earnings of $236.8 million.
The New York-based company said it had profit of 97 cents per share.
The results exceeded Wall Street expectations. The average estimate of seven analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for earnings of 95 cents per share.
The advertising company posted revenue of $3.71 billion in the period, which also beat Street forecasts. Six analysts surveyed by Zacks expected $3.65 billion.
Omnicom shares have declined almost 7 percent since the beginning of the year, while the Standard & Poor's 500 index has fallen 1 percent. The stock has risen almost 8 percent in the last 12 months.
